summary: This is an email chain regarding the discovery review in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, forwarded to the FBI. It appears to be external correspondence being shared with law enforcement, indicating coordination on evidence review.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the discovery review mentioned in the email chain.

events.title: Email regarding Maxwell discovery review
events.description: An email chain concerning the review of discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case is forwarded to the FBI.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain forwarded to the FBI regarding discovery in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The email is dated October 20, 2020, during the pre-trial phase of Maxwell's prosecution.
The subject indicates the email originated externally and was shared with law enforcement, showing coordination on case materials.
The recipient list includes 'USAHUB-USAJoumal111', which appears to be a U.S. Attorney's Office or Department of Justice email address.
The embedded file name suggests the email contains a forwarded message about the Maxwell discovery review.
